Description: This registry defines the messages for task related events.

TaskAborted.Description: The task with id %1 has been aborted.
TaskAborted.Message: The task with id %1 has been aborted.

TaskCancelled.Description: The task with id %1 has been cancelled.
TaskCancelled.Message: The task with id %1 has been cancelled.

TaskCompletedOK.Description: The task with id %1 has completed.
TaskCompletedOK.Message: The task with id %1 has completed.

TaskCompletedWarning.Description: The task with id %1 has completed with warnings.
TaskCompletedWarning.Message: The task with id %1 has completed with warnings.

TaskPaused.Description: The task with id %1 has been paused.
TaskPaused.Message: The task with id %1 has been paused.

TaskProgessChanged.Description: The task with id %1 has changed to progress %2 percent complete.
TaskProgessChanged.Message: The task with id %1 has changed to progress %2 percent complete.

TaskRemoved.Description: The task with id %1 has been removed.
TaskRemoved.Message: The task with id %1 has been removed.

TaskResumed.Description: The task with id %1 has been resumed.
TaskResumed.Message: The task with id %1 has been resumed.

TaskStarted.Description: The task with id %1 has started.
TaskStarted.Message: The task with id %1 has started.

Name: Task Event Message Registry
